body:
Hey guys back again with the third Community Spotlight! :) This one will be interesting, and I present to you, Zac! 

What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus? BestShockers and run from the Minotaur xDdDdD

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences. Howdy folks, I'm Zac and this is my pawn shop, o/// I like dank dinklage and peter memes. I was a mod but retired due to a staffwide conspiracy to take down ocn. I then became famous for being toxic and ruining the innocence of the server one member at a time before getting TS Dev.

What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment? dat ass

What interests you the most in life? Hanging out with my close group of friends (irl). We hang out for at least a few hours just about every day.

What music/art/media do you like? refer to my first answer ;)

Where are you from? New Jersey, right next to New York City.

What do you spend most of your time doing while on Avicus? I spend most of my time on the avicus network on TS talking to people and playing various games.
 
Anything else you want to mention? http://pastebin.com/jELjGicn

P.S.
For anyone who is interesting in getting their own spotlight, I have created an application. :) I will contact you on Skype if I'm interested in giving you a spotlight. 
https://goo.gl/forms/GCCz36F9XSOXVMfz2

title: Community Spotlight #3 - BestShockers

replies.body: Cool! :D I really like the way the questions are answered in this spotlight xD
replies.body_tagged: Cool! :D I really like the way the questions are answered in this spotlight xD

replies.body:
i hate that guy he banned me from ts 

but ayy he gave me some fried chicken so its all good.
